alert.note: Alert for Dukes; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:41PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dukes, west central Plymouth, southern Bristol, Washington, Newport, Kent, southern Providence and Bristol Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1140 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Block Island, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Brief torrential rainfall that will result in typical nuisance poor drainage street flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Providence, New Bedford, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Taunton, East Providence, Coventry, Dartmouth, South Kingstown, West Warwick, Johnston, North Kingstown, Bristol, Block Island, Westerly, Somerset, Barrington, Narragansett and Swansea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Dukes; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Western Plymouth
